cardDescription: Launch a fiery projectile at your opponent, dealing 10 damage. Burn, baby, burn!
Summon a bolt of lightning to smite your foe. It deals 15 damage and leaves them stunned.
A lowly goblin warrior with a rusty sword. He may be weak, but he's eager to serve.
Unleash the fiery breath of a dragon on your enemy. It burns for 20 damage over 3 turns.
A skilled elven archer with a keen eye. She deals 8 damage with her precise shots.
A massive golem made of enchanted stones. It has 40 health and deals 12 damage.
Recover 15 health points with this magical elixir. A lifesaver in dire situations.
Summon an icy shield to block incoming attacks. Absorbs 20 damage.
A dark sorcerer who can raise undead minions. He deals 10 damage and can revive fallen allies.
Harness the power of a phoenix feather to resurrect yourself once if you fall in battle.
A stealthy rogue with a deadly dagger. He deals 6 damage and can strike from the shadows.
Invoke the holy light to heal yourself or an ally for 15 health points.
A legendary dragon with immense power. It has 50 health and deals 25 damage.
Equip this enchanted sword to increase your minion's attack by 5 points.
A mystical protector of the forest. It has 30 health and deals 8 damage.
Summon a raging inferno to engulf your enemies. It deals 30 damage over 3 turns.
A wise healer with magical abilities. She can restore 20 health to you or an ally.
A deadly assassin concealed in the shadows. He deals 12 damage and has stealth.
Wear this enchanted amulet to reduce incoming damage by 50% for one turn.
A mage who can control the elements. He deals 18 damage and can call down lightning.
This dagger grants you lifesteal, allowing you to heal for 50% of the damage you deal.
A colossal guardian of immense strength. It has 60 health and deals 20 damage.
Bend time to your will, giving you an extra turn to strategize and take action.
Equip this bow to increase your ranged damage by 10 points.
Invoke the power of the phoenix to resurrect all fallen allies with full health.
A skilled miner with a pickaxe. He deals 7 damage and can uncover valuable resources.
Equip this shield to gain a temporary shield that absorbs 30 damage from incoming attacks.
A powerful ice sorceress who can freeze enemies. She deals 20 damage and slows foes.
